title: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. When targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. In some cases, the filenames do not appear at all.
OB: In the declare warning messages, the source path for targeting .class files from injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the source path should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Run the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/..
2. Observe the declare warning messages
3. Note that the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
